scenario_text.value:
Yeah, I have the same feeling...
Should we look around?

Isn’t that guy holding all the stuff
everyone’s been missing?!

Heh-heh-heh. I got my hands on lotsa nice
loot. Guess I’ll head on back!
So that’s the culprit! After him, Agumon!
Yeah! He went toward the forest! Let’s go!

The guy who stole everyone’s stuff ran to the
woods! Let’s chase him!
